course_title: Contextual Education Elective - Texts of Terror: Strategies for Interpreting Troublesome Texts
class_notes: (Concurrent Enrollment in CE 552A/ANGa/TPa required; permission number is required to enroll and should be requested by emailing candlerregistrar@emory.edu beginning April 28, 2021 at 7:00 am) (ON CAMPUS)
course_description: A course focusing on biblical texts that deeply trouble us, causing us outrage or pain, contextualized for students serving in ecclesial placements during contextual education II.
schedule_location: T 2:30pm-5:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_501
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4291, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: J. Wright, Status: Closed
